concept.title: Discover
concept.shortdesc: Welcome to the decentralized web. DWeb experimentation resulted in this website. Navigate through this landing page to access concepts, frequently asked questions and technical shares about decentralized content publishing.

div.p: You are currently using DWeb - this HTML is stored on the Interplanetary File System (IPFS).
This website's content is decentralized, replicated, and its authenticity and provenance are verifiable.
div.note: I support the Dweb principles. This site is independent, unpaid, and for informational purposes only.
